name: Countdown
author: Mark
intro_text:
You're among the jetset elite.
Presently, you've just been woken up by tubulence while taking a trip on your private jet.

player.name: Humdinger Jinglebottom
player.description: A snazzy fellow if I do say so myself.

seat.name: 0700, in the seat of luxry (a personal jetliner)
seat.description: You're seated comfortably on your JSX-900 series first-rate personal airline. Aside from the minor tubulence everything seems basically ok.

default.description: Your window is to the left of where you are seated.
default.examination:
On a closer look, something doesn't seem quite right. The flight plan shouldn't be leading you over water, much less an ocean, but all you can see in all directions is the deep blue sea.

...

Maybe you should go talk to the pilot.

on_enter.descripton:
The rumbling of turbulence catches you off guard as you stand up, and you stumble out into the aisle.
You get up and brush yourself off and take stock of the plane.

aisle.name: The aisle
aisle.description: You are standing in the aisle of the plane, more or less dead center.

default.examination:
On a closer look, something doesn't seem quite right. The flight plan shouldn't be leading you over water, much less an ocean, but all you can see in all directions is the deep blue sea.

...

Maybe you should go talk to the pilot.

default.description: forward from where you currently stand is the cockpit door.

default.examination: Now that you think about it, there were some control pannels or something back there too.

hidden.examination: You knock on the floor, it sounds hollow, probably because cargo is below you. Can't think of how to get at it though.

cockpit door.name: Outside the cockpit
cockpit door.description: You're right outside the door to the cockpit now.

default.description: You can see the vague figure of the pilot through the door's window.
default.examination: He seems kind of slumped over.

on_talk.description: Try as you might, you can't get the pilots attention, he continues looking straight ahead. Humph, what a rude fellow. You'll have to consider docking his pay if he's going to cop an attitude like that.

default.description: Going back will get you to the aisle again.

the loo.name: The Loo.
the loo.description: It's your personal loo in the back of the plane, it even includes an in-suite shower.

default.description: The shower seems to be off right now.

closed.description: There's a panel at the back of the room.
closed.examination: The control panel door is locked tightly shut. There's a keypad next to it.

triggers.text: You claw at the panel, but it does no good.

triggers.description: A rather direct solution to the problem, but it seems to work, the panel meekly swings open after you smash it with the extinguisher.

open.description: The shattered panel is now open, you can see the flashing LEDs of the actual control system behind it.
open.examination: The control system is pretty complicated, you're not really sure what to do with it.

default.examination: The blinking keypad goes from 0 to 9, but offers no hints at opening the panel next to it.

triggers.text:
You mash the keypad a whole lot and hit enter.

...

Unfortunately it looks like you guessed incorrectly. The pad flashes angrily and makes a buzzing sound.

default.description: Going forward will get you to the aisle again.

default.examination: You've got a packet of nuts in your pocket; a healthy snack.

default.description: A bright red fire extinguisher is in a case on the side wall.
default.examination: It's not particularly bulky, but you wonder what good a fire extinguisher would do if a fire actually happened several miles up.
